Video Caption: Tokyo Vlog #3 - Dining like an olympic athlete
Comment: Considering we are in a pandemic, the presentation of the bread and desserts at 0:25 is not very hygienic as they are exposed. There is nothing like a shield to protect the food from any kind of aerosol or droplets from the diners. Although the athletes are wearing masks, the masks are not 100% leak proof and some respiratory aerosol and droplets will escape.
